entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Lambton Shores
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow late this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High zero.
